name: james-beard-foundation
title: James Beard Foundation
subtitle: The culinary Oscars website
synopsis:
While at *The Mechanism* I worked on a small team to help realize a modern website for this illustrious non-profit. Since replaced, we built this Drupal-based website with designs from the client.

I was responsible for the frontend, site navigation, structure, and third party service integration (Twitter, Facebook, Open Table, Urbanspoon).

Moreover I was given free reign to design and build certain interface widgets that weren't fleshed out in the original specifications like custom calendar and search widgets.
